Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • clientSide.Student
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StudentInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Student
extends java.lang.Thread
implements StudentInterface
    General Description: Definition of the Student Thread - monitor-based solution. Authors Filipe Pires (85122) and Isaac dos Anjos (78191)
